indoor.name: Spider Plant
indoor.careInstructions: Water once a week. Prefers indirect sunlight.
indoor.description: A hardy, low-maintenance plant with arching leaves and small white flowers.

indoor.name: Snake Plant
indoor.description: Known for its upright, sword-like leaves and air-purifying qualities.

indoor.name: Peace Lily
indoor.careInstructions: Water regularly. Prefers low to medium light.
indoor.description: A plant with elegant white flowers and glossy green leaves.

indoor.name: ZZ Plant
indoor.careInstructions: Water when soil is dry. Thrives in low light.
indoor.description: Known for its waxy, dark green leaves and tolerance to neglect.

indoor.name: Pothos
indoor.careInstructions: Water when the top inch of soil is dry. Prefers indirect light.
indoor.description: A trailing plant with heart-shaped leaves and variegated patterns.

outdoor.name: Rose
outdoor.description: Classic flowering plant with a variety of colors and fragrances.

outdoor.name: Tulip
outdoor.description: Bright, colorful blooms that appear in spring.

outdoor.name: Lavender
outdoor.careInstructions: Water when dry. Prefers full sun.
outdoor.description: A fragrant herb with purple flowers used in aromatherapy.

outdoor.name: Hydrangea
outdoor.careInstructions: Water regularly. Prefers partial to full sun.
outdoor.description: Large, showy flowers that change color based on soil pH.

outdoor.name: Sunflower
outdoor.description: Tall plants with large, bright yellow flowers.

succulents.name: Aloe Vera
succulents.careInstructions: Water when dry. Prefers bright, indirect light.
succulents.description: A succulent with thick, fleshy leaves known for its soothing gel.

succulents.name: Echeveria
succulents.careInstructions: Water when soil is dry. Needs bright light.
succulents.description: Rosette-shaped succulent with a variety of colors.

succulents.name: Jade Plant
succulents.careInstructions: Water when the soil is dry. Prefers bright light.
succulents.description: A popular succulent with thick, rounded leaves.

succulents.name: Zebra Cactus
succulents.careInstructions: Water sparingly. Thrives in bright light.
succulents.description: A small succulent with striking white stripes on dark green leaves.

succulents.name: Burro's Tail
succulents.careInstructions: Water when dry. Prefers bright light.
succulents.description: A trailing succulent with long, bead-like leaves.

flowering_shrubs.name: Daisy
flowering_shrubs.careInstructions: Water regularly. Prefers full sun to partial shade.
flowering_shrubs.description: Charming, small plants with white petals and yellow centers, known for their resilience and beauty.

flowering_shrubs.name: Azalea
flowering_shrubs.careInstructions: Water regularly. Prefers acidic soil and partial shade.
flowering_shrubs.description: Known for its vibrant flowers and evergreen leaves.

flowering_shrubs.name: Lilac
flowering_shrubs.careInstructions: Water during dry periods. Prefers full sun.
flowering_shrubs.description: A shrub with fragrant, purple or white flowers in spring.

flowering_shrubs.name: Camellia
flowering_shrubs.careInstructions: Water regularly. Prefers acidic soil and partial shade.
flowering_shrubs.description: Produces large, showy flowers in winter or early spring.

flowering_shrubs.name: Forsythia
flowering_shrubs.careInstructions: Water during dry spells. Prefers full sun.
flowering_shrubs.description: Bright yellow flowers appear in early spring before the leaves.

top_variety.name: Spider Plant
top_variety.careInstructions: Water once a week. Prefers indirect sunlight.
top_variety.description: A hardy, low-maintenance plant with arching leaves and small white flowers.

top_variety.name: Rose
top_variety.description: Classic flowering plant with a variety of colors and fragrances.

top_variety.name: Aloe Vera
top_variety.careInstructions: Water when dry. Prefers bright, indirect light.
top_variety.description: A succulent with thick, fleshy leaves known for its soothing gel.

top_variety.name: Azalea
top_variety.careInstructions: Water regularly. Prefers acidic soil and partial shade.
top_variety.description: Known for its vibrant flowers and evergreen leaves.

top_variety.name: ZZ Plant
top_variety.careInstructions: Water when soil is dry. Thrives in low light.
top_variety.description: Known for its waxy, dark green leaves and tolerance to neglect.

top_variety.name: Jade Plant
top_variety.careInstructions: Water when the soil is dry. Prefers bright light.
top_variety.description: A popular succulent with thick, rounded leaves.

herbs.name: Basil
herbs.description: A fragrant herb with green leaves, commonly used in cooking, especially in Italian cuisine.

herbs.name: Mint
herbs.careInstructions: Keep soil moist. Prefers partial shade.
herbs.description: A versatile herb with a refreshing aroma, used in teas, salads, and various dishes.

herbs.name: Rosemary
herbs.description: A woody herb with needle-like leaves, often used in Mediterranean dishes.

herbs.name: Thyme
herbs.careInstructions: Water regularly but do not overwater. Prefers full sun.
herbs.description: A low-growing herb with small leaves and a pungent flavor, used in a variety of cuisines.

herbs.name: Parsley
herbs.careInstructions: Keep soil evenly moist. Prefers partial shade to full sun.
herbs.description: A popular herb with curly or flat leaves, often used as a garnish or in salads.
